hero.title: Staking & Rewards
hero.subtitle: Earn passive income by staking your RSK tokens on RSC Chain

what.title: What is Staking in RSC?
what.description: Staking allows you to lock your RSK tokens to support the RSC Chain network and earn rewards in return. It's a way to participate in network security while generating passive income.

benefit1.title: Earn Rewards
benefit1.description: Generate passive income by staking your tokens

benefit2.title: Support Network
benefit2.description: Help secure and validate the RSC Chain network

benefit3.title: Low Risk
benefit3.description: Secure staking with transparent rules and controls

step1.title: Stake Your Tokens
step1.description: Lock your RSK tokens in the staking pool

step2.title: Earn Rewards
step2.description: Receive rewards automatically based on your staked amount

step3.title: Compound or Withdraw
step3.description: Reinvest rewards or withdraw them to your wallet

lock.title: Lock Period
lock.description: Your tokens are locked for a specific period to ensure network security.

rewards.title: Rewards
rewards.description: Earn rewards based on your staked amount and the current APY rate.

unstake.title: Unstake
unstake.description: You can unstake your tokens after the lock period ends.

transparency.title: Transparency & Control
transparency.description: Full transparency in staking operations. Monitor your staked amount, rewards, and all transactions in real-time.
transparency.feature4: Full control over your staked tokens

cta.title: Start Staking Now
cta.description: Start earning rewards by staking your RSK tokens directly from your RSC Wallet.

hero.title: Learn & Education
hero.subtitle: Everything you need to know to get started with RSC Wallet

wallet.title: What is a Wallet?
wallet.description: A cryptocurrency wallet is a digital tool that allows you to store, send, and receive cryptocurrencies. Think of it as a digital bank account, but you have full control over your funds.
wallet.feature1: Store your RSK tokens and other cryptocurrencies
wallet.feature4: Full control over your digital assets

noncustodial.title: What is Non-Custodial?
noncustodial.description: A non-custodial wallet means you control your private keys. No third party has access to your funds. This is different from custodial wallets where a company holds your keys.

custodial.title: Custodial Wallets
custodial.point2: You depend on the company's security
custodial.point3: Risk of losing access if company fails

noncustodial.title: Non-Custodial Wallets (RSC Wallet)
noncustodial.point2: No third party can access your funds

seed.title: How to Protect Your Seed Phrase
seed.warning: Your seed phrase is the master key to your wallet. Never share it with anyone and store it securely.

step1.title: Write it Down
step1.description: Write your 12-word seed phrase on paper. Never store it digitally or take screenshots.

step2.title: Store Securely
step2.description: Keep it in a safe place, like a fireproof safe or safety deposit box. Consider making a backup copy.

step3.title: Never Share
step3.description: Never share your seed phrase with anyone. Legitimate services will never ask for it.

step4.title: Verify Backup
step4.description: Test your backup by restoring your wallet on a test device to ensure it works correctly.

step1.title: Download RSC Wallet
step1.description: Download the RSC Wallet app from the official website or app store.

step2.title: Create Your Wallet
step2.description: Follow the setup process to create a new wallet. Save your seed phrase securely.

step3.title: Secure Your Wallet
step3.description: Set up PIN or biometric authentication for additional security.

step4.title: Start Using
step4.description: You're ready! Start receiving RSK tokens, make payments, and explore DeFi features.

q1.question: Is RSC Wallet free to use?
q1.answer: Yes, RSC Wallet is completely free to download and use. You only pay network fees for transactions on RSC Chain.

q2.question: What happens if I lose my seed phrase?
q2.answer: If you lose your seed phrase, you will permanently lose access to your wallet and funds. This is why it's crucial to store it securely and never share it.

q3.question: Can I recover my wallet with my seed phrase?
q3.answer: Yes, you can recover your wallet on any device using your 12-word seed phrase. This is why it's so important to keep it safe.

q4.question: Is RSC Wallet safe?
q4.answer: Yes, RSC Wallet is a non-custodial wallet with industry-standard security. Your private keys never leave your device, and we never have access to your funds.

q5.question: Can I use RSC Wallet on multiple devices?
q5.answer: Yes, you can import your wallet on multiple devices using your seed phrase. However, make sure each device is secure.

q6.question: What cryptocurrencies does RSC Wallet support?
q6.answer: RSC Wallet primarily supports RSK tokens and other tokens on the RSC Chain. Check the app for the full list of supported assets.

hero.title: Institutional P2P Market
hero.subtitle: Enterprise-grade peer-to-peer trading infrastructure for financial institutions

what.title: What is Institutional P2P Market
what.description: The Institutional P2P Market is a sophisticated trading infrastructure designed for financial institutions, funds, and brokers. It enables secure, compliant, and efficient peer-to-peer transactions at scale, with built-in escrow services and regulatory compliance features.

feature1.title: Institutional Trading
feature1.description: High-volume trading capabilities designed for institutional participants with advanced order matching and settlement systems

feature2.title: Market Infrastructure
feature2.description: Robust market infrastructure with real-time pricing, order book management, and trade execution

feature3.title: Security & Trust
feature3.description: Enterprise-grade security with multi-signature wallets, cold storage integration, and comprehensive audit trails

escrow.title: Escrow Services
escrow.description: Automated escrow services ensure secure transactions by holding assets in custody until all conditions are met, protecting both parties in institutional trades.

feature1.title: Automated Custody
feature1.description: Smart contract-based escrow automatically holds assets until trade conditions are verified and completed

feature2.title: Multi-Party Verification
feature2.description: Requires verification from multiple parties before releasing funds, ensuring compliance and reducing fraud risk

feature3.title: Dispute Resolution
feature3.description: Built-in dispute resolution mechanisms with arbitration support for complex institutional transactions

compliance.title: Compliance & Regulatory
compliance.description: Comprehensive compliance framework designed to meet regulatory requirements for institutional financial services.

funds.title: Investment Funds
funds.description: Investment funds use the P2P market for secure asset trading, portfolio rebalancing, and efficient settlement.

brokers.title: Brokers & Trading Firms
brokers.description: Brokers and trading firms leverage the platform for client trading, market making, and liquidity provision.

cta.title: Institutional Contact
cta.description: Contact our institutional team to learn more about P2P Market infrastructure and discuss your specific requirements.

hero.title: RSC Chain
hero.subtitle: Enterprise blockchain infrastructure for institutional applications

what.title: What is RSC Chain
what.description: RSC Chain is a high-performance blockchain infrastructure designed for institutional use. Built with enterprise-grade security, scalability, and compliance features, it enables financial institutions to build and deploy decentralized applications at scale.

feature1.title: High Performance
feature1.description: Optimized for high throughput and low latency, supporting thousands of transactions per second

feature2.title: Enterprise Security
feature2.description: Multi-layer security architecture with advanced cryptography and institutional-grade key management

feature3.title: Regulatory Compliance
feature3.description: Built-in compliance features including KYC/AML integration and regulatory reporting capabilities

architecture.title: Architecture
architecture.description: RSC Chain features a modular, layered architecture designed for flexibility, scalability, and institutional requirements.

layer1.title: Consensus Layer
layer1.description: Robust consensus mechanism ensuring network security and transaction finality

layer2.title: Execution Layer
layer2.description: High-performance execution environment supporting smart contracts and complex transactions

layer3.title: Application Layer
layer3.description: Developer-friendly APIs and tools for building institutional applications and services

consensus.title: Consensus Mechanism
consensus.description: RSC Chain uses an advanced consensus mechanism designed for institutional-grade security, performance, and decentralization.

feature1.title: Fast Finality
feature1.description: Rapid transaction confirmation with deterministic finality, ensuring immediate settlement

feature2.title: High Throughput
feature2.description: Optimized consensus algorithm supporting high transaction volumes without compromising security

feature3.title: Byzantine Fault Tolerance
feature3.description: Resilient to network failures and malicious actors, maintaining network integrity under all conditions

scalability.title: Scalability
scalability.description: RSC Chain is designed to scale with institutional demand, supporting growing transaction volumes and network participants.

case1.title: Central Bank Digital Currencies
case1.description: Central banks leverage RSC Chain infrastructure for CBDC implementation and digital currency systems.

case2.title: Cross-Border Payments
case2.description: Financial institutions use RSC Chain for fast, low-cost cross-border payment networks and remittance services.

case3.title: Digital Asset Infrastructure
case3.description: Institutions build digital asset platforms, tokenization systems, and DeFi protocols on RSC Chain.

hero.title: REESK (RSK)
hero.subtitle: The native digital asset of RSC Chain ecosystem

what.title: What is RSK
what.description: RSK (REESK) is the native digital asset of the RSC Chain ecosystem. It serves as the primary utility token, enabling transactions, governance, staking, and various ecosystem functions within the RSC network.

feature1.title: Native Asset
feature1.description: The fundamental digital asset powering all operations and transactions on RSC Chain

feature2.title: Network Utility
feature2.description: Essential for transaction fees, smart contract execution, and network participation

feature3.title: Ecosystem Integration
feature3.description: Deeply integrated across all RSC Chain services, applications, and infrastructure

role.title: Role in Ecosystem
role.description: RSK plays a central role in the RSC Chain ecosystem, serving multiple critical functions that enable the network's operation and growth.

feature1.title: Transaction Medium
feature1.description: Primary currency for all transactions, payments, and value transfers on RSC Chain

feature2.title: Governance Participation
feature2.description: Enables holders to participate in network governance and decision-making processes

feature3.title: Staking & Rewards
feature3.description: Used for staking to secure the network and earn rewards for network participation

supply.title: Supply & Utility
supply.description: RSK has a carefully designed supply mechanism and multiple utility functions within the RSC Chain ecosystem.

case1.title: Treasury Management
case1.description: Institutions use RSK for treasury management, holding reserves, and managing digital asset portfolios.

case2.title: Payment Infrastructure
case2.description: RSK serves as the foundation for institutional payment systems and cross-border transactions.

case3.title: Staking & Yield
case3.description: Institutions stake RSK to earn rewards while contributing to network security and stability.

endpoint3.title: WebSocket RPC
endpoint3.description: WebSocket endpoint for real-time blockchain data

architecture.title: Technical Architecture
architecture.description: Understanding the technical architecture of RSC Chain helps developers build better applications and integrations.

layer1.title: Consensus Layer
layer1.description: The consensus mechanism ensures network security and transaction finality through a robust validation process

layer2.title: Network Layer
layer2.description: P2P networking layer handles node communication, block propagation, and peer discovery

layer3.title: Application Layer
layer3.description: Smart contract execution environment and application interfaces for building decentralized applications

github.title: GitHub Repositories
github.description: Access the source code, contribute to development, and explore RSC Chain repositories on GitHub.

hero.title: APIs & SDKs
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive SDKs and APIs for building on RSC Chain

walletSDK.title: Wallet SDK
walletSDK.description: Integrate wallet functionality into your applications with our comprehensive Wallet SDK. Available for multiple programming languages and platforms.

paymentsSDK.title: Payments SDK
paymentsSDK.description: Process payments seamlessly with our Payments SDK. Handle QR payments, instant transfers, and payment processing with ease.

example1.title: Create Wallet
example1.description: Example code for creating a new wallet account

example2.title: Process Payment
example2.description: Example code for processing a payment transaction
example2.code: const payment = await PaymentsSDK.create({ amount, recipient });

example3.title: Check Balance
example3.description: Example code for checking wallet balance

versioning.title: Versioning
versioning.description: Our SDKs follow semantic versioning. Check the latest versions and changelogs for each package.

version1.name: Wallet SDK
version1.description: Latest stable version with enhanced security features and performance improvements

version2.name: Payments SDK
version2.description: Latest stable version with new payment methods and bug fixes

hero.title: Testnet
hero.subtitle: Test and develop on RSC Chain testnet without using real funds

what.title: What is Testnet
what.description: RSC Chain testnet is a separate blockchain network designed for testing and development. It uses test tokens that have no real value, allowing developers to experiment freely without financial risk.

benefit1.title: Risk-Free Testing
benefit1.description: Test your applications and smart contracts without using real funds or assets

benefit2.title: Full Functionality
benefit2.description: Testnet provides the same functionality as mainnet, allowing comprehensive testing

benefit3.title: Free Test Tokens
benefit3.description: Obtain test tokens from the faucet to start testing immediately

faucet.title: Faucet
faucet.description: The testnet faucet provides free test tokens for development and testing purposes.

card.title: Get Test Tokens
card.description: Request test tokens directly from the faucet to fund your testnet wallet for development and testing.
card.info2: No real value, safe to experiment

explorer.title: Blockchain Explorer
explorer.description: Explore the testnet blockchain, view transactions, blocks, and smart contracts using the testnet explorer.

card.title: Testnet Explorer
card.description: Browse transactions, blocks, accounts, and smart contracts on the RSC Chain testnet.

limitations.title: Limitations
limitations.description: Important limitations and considerations when using the testnet for development.

limitation1.title: No Real Value
limitation1.description: Test tokens have no real monetary value and cannot be exchanged for real assets

limitation2.title: Network Resets
limitation2.description: Testnet may be reset periodically, causing loss of test data and transactions

limitation3.title: Performance Differences
limitation3.description: Testnet performance may differ from mainnet due to lower network activity

limitation4.title: Not for Production
limitation4.description: Testnet is for development only and should not be used for production applications

hero.title: RSC Technical Roadmap
hero.subtitle: Transparency about what's being built, what's in progress, and what's coming.

now.label: Now
now.title: In Development
now.description: Current work on Wallet, APIs, and core infrastructure.

item1.title: Wallet Core Features
item1.description: Enhanced wallet functionality with improved security, multi-signature support, and advanced transaction management.

item2.title: Payment APIs
item2.description: Expanding payment API capabilities with new endpoints, webhook improvements, and enhanced documentation.

item3.title: Core Infrastructure
item3.description: Improving blockchain infrastructure with better scalability, performance optimizations, and network stability enhancements.

next.label: Next
next.title: Upcoming
next.description: Bridge development, consensus improvements, and developer tooling.

item1.title: Cross-Chain Bridge
item1.description: Development of a secure cross-chain bridge to enable asset transfers between RSC Chain and other major blockchains.

item2.title: Consensus Improvements
item2.description: Enhancing consensus mechanism for better performance, lower latency, and improved network efficiency.

item3.title: Developer Tooling
item3.description: New development tools, improved SDKs, and enhanced debugging capabilities for developers building on RSC Chain.

later.label: Later
later.title: Exploration
later.description: Optimization, advanced features, and integrations under consideration.

item1.title: Layer 2 Solutions
item1.description: Exploring Layer 2 scaling solutions to further improve transaction throughput and reduce costs.

item2.title: Advanced DeFi Features
item2.description: Research and development of advanced DeFi features including lending, borrowing, and yield farming protocols.

item3.title: Enterprise Integrations
item3.description: Building integrations with major enterprise systems and traditional financial infrastructure.

cta.title: Contribute & Build on RSC
cta.description: Join our community of developers building the future of decentralized finance. Contribute code, report issues, or build your own projects on RSC Chain.

hero.title: About RSC
hero.subtitle: The organization behind the RSC ecosystem

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: Our vision is to create a decentralized financial ecosystem that empowers individuals and institutions worldwide, making financial services accessible, transparent, and secure for everyone.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to build and maintain the RSC Chain infrastructure, providing innovative blockchain solutions that enable secure, fast, and cost-effective financial transactions while fostering financial inclusion and innovation.

philosophy.title: Philosophy
philosophy.description: Our core philosophy guides everything we do and shapes our approach to building the RSC ecosystem.

principle1.title: Decentralization
principle1.description: We believe in the power of decentralized systems to create more transparent, fair, and resilient financial infrastructure.

principle2.title: Security First
principle2.description: Security is at the core of everything we build, ensuring the safety of user funds and data above all else.

principle3.title: Open Innovation
principle3.description: We foster an open ecosystem where developers, businesses, and institutions can innovate and build together.

hero.title: Security & Compliance
hero.subtitle: Our commitment to security and protecting user assets

model.title: Security Model
model.description: RSC employs a comprehensive, multi-layered security model designed to protect user assets, data, and the integrity of the network.

feature1.title: Multi-Layer Protection
feature1.description: Multiple layers of security including encryption, access controls, and monitoring systems

feature2.title: Key Management
feature2.description: Advanced key management systems with hardware security modules and secure key storage

feature3.title: Continuous Monitoring
feature3.description: 24/7 monitoring and threat detection systems to identify and respond to security incidents

responsibilities.title: Responsibilities
responsibilities.description: We take our security responsibilities seriously and are committed to maintaining the highest standards.

responsibility1.title: Asset Protection
responsibility1.description: Protecting user assets through secure infrastructure and best-in-class security practices

responsibility2.title: Data Privacy
responsibility2.description: Ensuring user data privacy and compliance with data protection regulations

responsibility3.title: Transparency
responsibility3.description: Maintaining transparency about our security practices and any incidents that may occur

practices.title: Best Practices
practices.description: Security best practices we follow to ensure the safety of our platform and users.
practices.practice1: Regular security audits and penetration testing
practices.practice2: Employee security training and awareness programs
practices.practice3: Incident response and disaster recovery plans

hero.title: Careers
hero.subtitle: Join us in building the future of decentralized finance

position1.title: Senior Blockchain Developer
position1.description: Lead development of blockchain infrastructure and smart contracts for RSC Chain.

position2.title: Security Engineer
position2.description: Design and implement security measures to protect RSC Chain infrastructure and user assets.

position3.title: Product Manager
position3.description: Drive product strategy and development for RSC ecosystem products and services.

culture.title: Company Culture
culture.description: We foster a culture of innovation, collaboration, and continuous learning.

value1.title: Innovation
value1.description: We encourage creative thinking and innovative solutions to complex problems

value2.title: Collaboration
value2.description: We believe in working together as a team to achieve our common goals

value3.title: Growth
value3.description: We support professional development and continuous learning for all team members

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Interested in joining our team? Reach out to us.
